description: Extract creation, modification, and publication timestamps from webpages to evaluate content freshness and support temporal analysis. Utilize multiple data sources including HTML meta tags, HTTP headers, JSON-LD, and heuristic methods for comprehensive timestamp detection. Process single or batch URLs with configurable options and confidence scoring for reliable results.

capabilities.name: extract_timestamps
capabilities.description: Extract creation, modification, and publication timestamps from a webpage

capabilities.name: batch_extract_timestamps
capabilities.description: Extract timestamps from multiple webpages in batch
